subtitle: today is day 49 in climbing the
spiritual ladder of self-improvement and
serving as a conduit for goodness and
godliness in the world today we focus on
malhot of mahut on the nobility in
nobility on the sovereignty of your
sovereignty and somewhat paradoxically
on the mystical meaning of mahut which
involves emptying yourself of self doing
that selflessly and giving yourself over
to Transcendent virtues greater than
yourself how can it be that nobility and
sovereignty of self involve emptying and
giving over yourself to virtues greater
than yourself it is because softness
blocks one's ability to practice virtue
when we get over ourselves ourselves can
shine more brightly we can Channel
greater godliness and we can experience
greater meaning in life we can become
our best selves our true ourselves May
these 49 days of spiritual growth help
each of us become better versions of
ourselves and thereby make the world a
better place
